title: Bolton Ousted & Gun Safety
itunes:title: Bolton Ousted & Gun Safety
description:
Kevin spoke with Matt Gorman, Vice President at Targeted Victory & Former NRCC Communications Director and Kevin Chavous, Democratic Strategist and Managing Partner at the Chavous Group and former President of the DC Young Democrats. They discussed President Trump firing National Security Advisor John Bolton, and gun safety legislation.

Kevin also spoke with Brett Bruen, President of the Global Situation Room and former White House Director of Global Engagement.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
